title: Signs and Moses’ Objections
summary: Exodus 4 continues Moses' call as he doubts his ability. God gives him miraculous signs and appoints Aaron to speak on his behalf. Moses returns to Egypt to begin his mission.

faq.question: What signs did God give Moses?
faq.answer: A staff that turns into a snake, a leprous hand healed, and water turned to blood.

faq.question: Why was Aaron appointed to help Moses?
faq.answer: Because Moses said he wasn’t a good speaker, so God chose Aaron to speak for him.
